name: Line Pitch
tag_list: news, world, business, local, fashion, entertainment, us, politics, life, health, sports, learning, education
overview:
Linepitch.com is a global invitation to help shape what other media outlets do not cover and a place where people across the world share stories of the events happening near them and personal opinions about issues that miss the headlines. We want to be the every day Line Pitch community that helps to tell the world which reports should become part of the global news coverage on mainstream media.

For this to work, we all need to operate under a few guiding principles:

Who’s invited?

You must be at least 13 years old to participate.

What kind of content is welcome here? Linepitch.com is a place to post your news: great stories of events near you, or your own take on issues making headlines. News comes in all shapes and sizes, and the idea here at Line Pitch is that the community will shape what counts as news, but there are a few things every LinePitch should have in common:

It’s yours. Your Line Pitch should be made up of your own words and images, or those that you have the rights to use. It’s true. Line Pitch should be about real events, or real opinions on events. It’s not news if you make it up. It’s new and interesting. The best Linepitch.com teach us something new or start a fresh discussion.

What isn’t welcome?

Content that infringes someone’s copyright. Content that you know to be untrue. Spam, or repeated uploads that flood the site with duplicate versions of the same or similar content. Pornography/sexually explicit content. Obscene/lewd content. Content that advocates violent behavior. Content that contains violent images of killing or physical abuse that appear to have been captured solely, or principally, for exploitive, prurient or gratuitous purposes. Content that advocates dangerous, illegal or predatory acts or poses a reasonable threat to personal or public safety. Hate Speech/Racially or ethnically offensive content.

What happens if you post something that violates the Community Guidelines? Our Admins will review it and take it down from the site. If you post more than three pieces of material that need to be removed from the site, your account will be disabled.
